name: Ashnod
text: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.

editions.flavor: Ashnod served as Mishra's confidante while he led Fallaji weapons development before the Brothers' War. Whereas Mishra works in metals and stone, however, Ashnod works in living flesh. She sees all living things as prototype machines; her "improvements" to them make her as feared by allies as by enemies.

name: Ashnod's Altar
text: Sacrifice a creature: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

editions.flavor: The Brothers' War scarred the land, but Ashnod left her mark in the bloodlines of those she tortured.

name: Ashnod's Battle Gear
text:

name: Ashnod's Coupon
